Summary: Biochemical reaction from nortriptyline to amitriptyline.
Biochemical reaction from nortriptyline to desmethylnortriptyline. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP1A2, CYP2D6 or CYP2C19.
Biochemical reaction from nortriptyline to hydroxynortriptyline. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP2D6.
Biochemical reaction from amitriptyline to nortriptyline. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP2C8, CYP2C9, CYP3A4 or CYP2C19.
Biochemical reaction from hydroxyamitriptyline to amitriptyline n-glucuronide. This interaction can be catalyzed by UGT1A3, UGT1A4 or UGT2B10.
Biochemical reaction from amitriptyline to hydroxyamitriptyline. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP2D6.
Biochemical reaction from amitriptyline to amitriptylinoxide. This interaction is catalyzed by FMO3.
Biochemical reaction from hydroxynortriptyline to oxonortriptyline. This interaction can be catalyzed by AKR1C2 or AKR1C1.
Transport from nortriptyline to nortriptyline. This interaction is catalyzed by ABCB1.
Transport from amitriptyline to amitriptyline. This interaction is catalyzed by ABCB1.
